data.persona: I am a homeless in the kingdom. I am always hungry. I have lost my ability to walk.
data.description:
You are in the hidden cave.
Tucked away under the rigid rocks of the cold hard landscape the cave nestles a small covered patch of frozen ground riddled with wet ice and rocks making it an uncomfortable yet inviting space out of the cold.
There's a bed, a rock, the ground, some wood, and a cave here.

You are carrying a copper coin, and wearing a ratty shirt and some soleless shoes.

data.short_motivation: I want to get rid of my shoes
data.mid_motivation: I want to get new shoes
data.long_motivation: I want to use my copper coin to buy shoes

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: steal a copper coin from a farmer

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put my copper coin in my bed

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give my copper coin to the shoe store
